Key Match Events: India lost all 10 wickets for the first time in the tournament
Australia put up a stubborn batting partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Shah Rukh Khan congratulated the Indian cricket team for their stellar performance
Abhinav Bindra congratulated the Australian cricket team and expressed solidarity with team India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in the world's largest stadium in Gujarat
Cricket is the most popular sport in India
Many fans expressed hope about India winning the next World Cup
Others: The Australian pacers were lethal, bowling India out for just 240 runs
